changelog.zh:
- 性能优化：M3U 台标超时时间缩短至 3 秒，快速回退到数据库台标
- 性能优化：M3U/TXT 解析使用 Isolate，避免主线程阻塞
- 性能优化：数据库分块批量插入（每 500 条），大幅提升导入速度
- 性能优化：台标延迟加载，只在需要时才查询数据库
- 性能优化：日志批量写入（缓冲 100 条），减少磁盘 I/O
- 性能优化：台标加载并发控制（最多 10 个），避免大量频道时卡死
- 优化：导入大型播放列表（5000+ 频道）速度提升 10 倍以上
- 优化：实时显示导入进度（60%-100%）
- 优化：台标状态全局缓存，避免重复加载
- 优化：智能频道名称匹配（CCTV-01高码率 → CCTV1）
- 修复：M3U 台标加载等待时间过长（从 20 秒降至 3 秒）
- 修复：台标加载后变回默认图标的问题
- 修复：导入大型播放列表时界面卡死的问题
- 修复：日志级别切换后不生效的问题
- 新增：自定义缓存管理器，优化台标加载性能
- 新增：日志自动刷新机制（每 30 秒）
- 新增：重置设置时自动关闭日志
changelog.en:
- Performance: M3U logo timeout reduced to 3 seconds, fast fallback to database
- Performance: M3U/TXT parsing in Isolate to avoid blocking UI
- Performance: Database batch insert in chunks (500 per batch)
- Performance: Lazy loading for channel logos
- Performance: Batch log writing (buffer 100 entries)
- Performance: Logo loading concurrency control (max 10), prevent freeze with many channels
- Improved: 10x faster import for large playlists (5000+ channels)
- Improved: Real-time import progress display (60%-100%)
- Improved: Global logo state cache to avoid duplicate loading
- Improved: Smart channel name matching (CCTV-01高码率 → CCTV1)
- Fixed: M3U logo loading timeout too long (from 20s to 3s)
- Fixed: Logo reverting to default after loading
- Fixed: UI freeze when importing large playlists
- Fixed: Log level not taking effect after switching
- Added: Custom cache manager for optimized logo loading
- Added: Auto-flush logs every 30 seconds
- Added: Auto-disable logs when resetting settings
